title: Av Avdeevka Directive Russian Army Sheled Novobakhmutivka, Berdychi, Semenivka, Pervomayska And Neelsk of Donetsk Region ...
content: At Avdiyivka Direction Russian Army Shelled Novobakhmutivka, Berdychi, Semenivka, PervomaySke and Neverske of Donetsk Region. Russian Aviation Conduction Airstrikes at Ocharetyne, Novobakhmutivka, Semenivka, Karlivka of Donetsk Region
